messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Pre-schooler skills
messages.msgSnippet: I just had to respond to this Preschool List . How horrible! My son just turned 5 in April, and can t do half the stuff in the 4 year old section! He doesn t
messages.messageBody:
I just had to respond to this "Preschool List". How horrible! My son just turned 5 in April, and can't do half the stuff in the 4 year old section! He doesn't care about writing or reading or math. Yes, he knows his numbers up to 10, but to count to 100? Sheesh! And he could care less about coloring. He's working now on copying things that I write for him, like his name or I love you. He does pretty good with that. If I'm not mistaken, when I was in PS, we didn't do half that stuff till 1st grade! What is this woman thinking? Some people are going to read this list and freak out because their child isn't doing that stuff. And that is just sad. :-(

Sarah


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
